title: Replacement font required, as close as possible
author: bripriuk

comments.content: You might want to take a look at Century Book. There are many of them available all with slight variations.

I think a version of Modern Extended like e.g. **[Modern Extended EF Book](http://web.archive.org/web/20140725060006/http:/www.findmyfont.com/index.php/fonts/font-preview?fset=Elsner%2BFlake&ffam=ModernExtendedEF%20Book%20-%20Regular&fid=a7fe3311fb67458f691ff5aa671477b8&fsize=48&text=John%20Baird%20Considering%20how%20well%20accepted%20Muswell%20Alexandra%20Palace&wrap=2)** or **Monotype Modern** would be very close to your sample
